commit.message:
kill regr test using ad-hoc lint

This was a pretty narrow test to start with, and it's kind of a pain to
update it. Not worth the trouble IMO.

files.patch:

-
-#![feature(plugin)]
-#![plugin(lint)]
-
-struct Foo {
-}
-
-impl Foo {
-    fn bar(&self) -> usize {
-    22
-    }
-
-    fn baz(&self) -> usize {
-    22
-    }
-}
-
-fn main() { }
